title: Enticing Diamond & Emerald Haar with South Sea Pearl Drops
materials: and 22.85ct South Sea Pearls (12 pieces). Locket weight:1.45ct with 9.85ct of 5 pearl beads. Exquisite Hyderabadi polish for a lasting lustre. Diamond weight is 6.91ct.
features: This captivating Haaram features an intricate Nakshi design with floral motifs, meticulously set with sparkling diamonds. The pendant showcases a vibrant emerald at its core, gracefully complemented by dangling South Sea pearls, creating a mesmerizing cascade. The design incorporates traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic.
colors: The warm yellow gold beautifully contrasts with the verdant green of the emeralds
the fiery red of the rubies
and the lustrous white of the pearls
creating a rich and harmonious color palette.
occasions: and grand festive celebrations. This Haaram is a treasured addition to any bridal trousseau (pellikuturu)
description: This exquisite necklace embodies the essence of South Indian heritage with a contemporary twist. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. The meticulous craftsmanship and timeless design make it a valuable heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
